name: PLATH
description: PLATH is a meme coin with a charitable purpose to support the endangered Platypus. PLATH donate to conservation efforts to support platypuses at market cap milestones. PLATH have adopted a growing number Platypuses from the WWF and have a charity road map with set goals to support research into conservation efforts with Platypus sanctuary's. PLATH is also a fun meme, with various different characters in our unique style drawn by the artist on our team. The team at PLATH have developed NFT's, which are verified by tensor.trade.
